website_summaries.verdict: Other models may not catch those stubborn, coarse hairs on your face, bikini line or anywhere else.
pros: Wax warms up quickly – usually in 20 or so minutes
If this model looks familiar, it's because it's often used in spas
cons: Kit does not come with pre-wax powder or wax remover to take off leftover flakes
Make sure you have baby powder and baby oil on hand before starting

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, Damaged!!
customer_reviews.text: All of the bottles arrived previously opened with the original contents (waxes and oils) discarded and replaced with MAUVE COLORED PAINT!!! Look at the photo. It was clear when the package arrived it had been previously opened as it did not arrive sealed. Do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roger H.

customer_reviews.title: Loved my Gigi waxing machine kit
customer_reviews.text: Was thrilled with my new kit. I’ve never used a water in my own, found it great and easy to use. Had everything I needed and more. I highly recommend it ... I bought this one because I own a Gigi parafine machine for so many years and it has been great so just knowing the brand name made me buy this wax machine for my personal use, turned out to be a great investment too. Thank you I’m a satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Sostre

customer_reviews.title: The wax warmer is great does the job turns on turns off low to ...
customer_reviews.text: The wax warmer is great does the job turns on turns off low to high heat. The problem is the wax this kit comes with is terrible. Doesn't remove hair all that well. If you have coarse hair run away and dont look back. You need to buy a separately wax for this kit as the wax it comes with is not at all good at removing hair and it gets stuck to everything!!! You are better off buying the warmer and the wax separately . The bottles that come with the kit are not that great either.
customer_reviews.author: Canada403

customer_reviews.title: i was also disappointed that unlike my last GIGI machine
customer_reviews.text: The wax contister came with wax on the outside of it. So much so I had to go buy a different wax for my machine.i was also disappointed that unlike my last GIGI machine, there was no wax remover that came with this, so I also needed to go purchase that too.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: The warmer is great
customer_reviews.text: The wax warmer is great. The soft wax is a mess, there is no good way to use that! If it gets on your hands and it will, it's impossible to come off. I bought a hard wax and it works way better.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of two

customer_reviews.title: Great kit bad wax.
customer_reviews.text: I like this kit for the price but the wax that comes with it is horrible. I couldn't even get the lid off to use it without having a taffy pull. The lid pulled out half the wax and this is before I could put it in the warmer. I'd recommend buying a better wax when you buy this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Assorted

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’m a licensed cosmetologist and purchased this item to use at home. I definitely love it for what it is. I wouldn’t use it professionally in my opinion but it’s definitely good for a home use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Allbert

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Temp control is good, wax was okay. Company has better ones I’d recommend instead of the one that come with the kit. The strips that come in the kit are ridiculously messy and get pieces everywhere. Made a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The wax works good for an in home waxing system. However be carful where you use it in the house, very messy.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Get Different Wax
customer_reviews.text: The kit itself is good. Warms wax very quickly and doesn't get too hot. However, the wax is terrible. It seeps through the strips and doesn't remove hair when pulling the strip off. It makes my skin bright red and peel for several days afterward even without removing hair. I have been waxing myself and getting waxed for many years but never experienced anything like this.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it says it will do. I wish I had picked a different formulation of the wax. The sensitive skin formulation is just too soft. But, the machine does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Hobson

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I loved how the kit comes with everything u need except baby powder but thats ok. the quality is good ! I was very verrrrrry skeptical about it but I dont regret purchasing it ! the pre and after poducts are GREAAAT AND SMELL GOOD ! 5 stars !
customer_reviews.author: doris

customer_reviews.title: Real Customer Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 5. I ordered this from Los Angeles and I was concerned the 106 temperature and yesterday was going to affect he quality of my shipment after reading how so many other reviews stated their products were opened and spilt and or broken and luckily when I recieved my package (in two days) all items in this kit were unbroken, and for the most part unopened (the pre wax cleanser cap was loose) but did not spill. Very clean. Can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard lesson.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good with this order with the exception that the wax is "hard" wax! If you're not familiar with this wax nor how to use it, the kit is useless unless you spend more money, to buy liquid wax, which is what I had to do. Other than that, the kit is complete and very nice!
customer_reviews.author: April Reyes

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this one. It really serves better than its price. It has different temperature setting which makes me easy to use it. The wax is moderately heated so it doesn't burn or harm my skin. Also, the quality of wax and creams is really good. I totally like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My female and male friends love it too
customer_reviews.text: It's the first time I ever tried waxing and my friends male and female let me wax there legs, chin, chest, arms and eyebrows. At first they were afraid it would hurt and I was afraid that I would mess up but it's easy and barely any pain compared to going to get it done at a spa. Plus it comes with a book that instructs how to properly do each body part and the goes and whys. I love it and my friends love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashka

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: Everything works except the bottles were leaking and the wax was all over was hard to get it off
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this waxing kit! It is easy to use. Works well. Comes with everything you need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: Great products way cheaper the buying a salon store
customer_reviews.text: Great products way cheaper the buying a salon store, only downside is the pink wax I do not recommend using also do not store the pink wax upside down or in its side it will make a mess I learned from the mistake it does not harden like regular honey or hard wax, the strips are a ok for beginning use. Fun kit to learn with to
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Wax but good wax heater.
customer_reviews.text: Awful wax. Stuck to everything except the hair. Such a time waster. You will need a new wax.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, accompanying products were opened prior to delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The Gigi mini pro was exactly what I thought it would be. On time delivery, and I love it. However, 2 of the products included were sub par. The pre hon and wax remover samples were both leaking upon delivery. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Louwho

customer_reviews.text: The lid was cracked when i received The package, but seems to work okay
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible wax and strips
customer_reviews.text: Warmer is fine. The wax and wax strips are horrible. The wax is a gooey pink mess. It seeps through the wax strips making it impossible to firmly press on them resulting in half the wax sticking to you and not the strip.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The box is in tact. The lid to the warmer is broken into pieces. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Moma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best wax wormed ever. I really recommended this product
customer_reviews.author: ai1428n

customer_reviews.title: The wax is VERY sticky. Mine was delivered with ...
customer_reviews.text: The wax is VERY sticky. Mine was delivered with the wax having spilled out all over the packaging and my bottle of Pre hon was half gone because it had spilled. This kit does NOT contain the powder that they say you need to use before waxing. Probably wouldn't buy this again I would try a different type of wax.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: The effect is very good
customer_reviews.text: The effect is very good, take off very clean, also won't hurt very much
customer_reviews.author: Catrina Mapps

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my daughter. She loves ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter. She loves it and is always asking friends and family to give them a wax!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilabay

customer_reviews.title: Does not
customer_reviews.text: The soft wax is extremely difficult to clean up. Kit does not include the clean up product. Wax does not come off with soap and water and when you’ve just waxed and trying to scrub off the excess wax is almost unbareable
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I got it earlier than expected abd it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to do brows myself and when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to do brows myself and when I want to! Little scary at first but very cool! Practice makes perfect! A great deal too.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Eisener

customer_reviews.title: Shipping defects
customer_reviews.text: Product was intracted with the package and leaked on the side of the box ...
customer_reviews.author: Saronah

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's really good.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks top cam with a craxk on the top. Other than that it's really good.
customer_reviews.author: lillith hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came with so much to get you started great value!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work - the wax didn’t stick to the hair so nothing came out (even after following the directions). Now I’m out money spent on this and stuck with a product that is useless.
customer_reviews.author: John Amico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I don’t like the wax I use ceripil
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. The lid was broken in half, the lid to the wax was as well. Resulting in pink wax all over the box and everything inside of it. Oh and buyer beware, you can't return this do to the special handling of the items? Absolutely horrendous and ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Momma

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it on her first use and it saves me a few bucks from her going to the salon. The wax that comes with it was a little sticky for her liking but we will order some later on down the road. Overall the kit is nice with anything someone at home would ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My wife is in love....
customer_reviews.text: My wife is in love! She says it's the most amazing wax experience she's ever experienced. I bought it for a Christmas gift and it made her more happy than diamond earrings! 2 thumbs up from a lady who used to pay a lot of money at the spa getting a wax.
customer_reviews.author: 2Morrows

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: Wax was way too sticky and did not remove hair. Difficult to use. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Like it. But not the wax it comes with. Too creamy
customer_reviews.text: Good kit. I love what comes with it as far as lotions. But I don’t like the wax. It is very creamy and hard to work with. I much rather prefer the Honey wax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wax machine itself is wonderful and works well
customer_reviews.text: The wax machine itself is wonderful and works well. However, trust me when I say the strips and the wax that came with this set are horrendous. I continue to use the wax machine; however I use a different wax and different waxing strips.
customer_reviews.author: DCdczbK

customer_reviews.title: Saved me some $$
customer_reviews.text: Buying this has saved me $48 per month in waxing costs, that's another pair of shoes! and this formula is easier and less painful than the honey wax. lasts a long long while if your the only one using it. easy instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Tenietsha McCrayer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped melting after two months
customer_reviews.text: Ordered end of April. Used 3 times. Loved it, but it not heat anymore. Of course right after return option ended. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sunday

customer_reviews.title: This set is bomb
customer_reviews.text: Good set. The dvd is a good review the help the removal results come out better
customer_reviews.author: BrownSugaPoptart

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 👎🏾 it did not work upon arrival I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Sherene Woodard

customer_reviews.title: I have some very stubborn hairs and the Gigi wax ...
customer_reviews.text: I have some very stubborn hairs and the Gigi wax kit has removed 98 percent of my face and body hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Lavone Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, however, I probably will not use the products that came with it. Vaseline works well to remove any leftover wax..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want to recommend this kit because before I used shaved my underarm ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to recommend this kit because before I used shaved my underarm like 4 x / week but now it's only 1x a month
customer_reviews.author: Anj

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The warmer is cheaply made and the wax and strips do not have remove as well as the gigi products in the salon. I used to perform waxes professionally and I can tell you that these are not professional quality products. If you know anyone that has a license have him buy you a pot from a beauty supply store I would say go ahead and do that. Unfortunately out of convenience I just ordered from Amazon Prime so I didn't feel like going to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expert Waxer
customer_reviews.text: I am former Licensed Esthetician so i know a thing or two about waxing... the warmer and accessories are great, especially for the price! the downer is it does not come with any wax remover and the included type of wax is very gooey and messy making it hard to clean up. i had to use baby oil to clean my skin and accidental drips after waxing was completed...i will be purchasing a different wax to use with it in the future. The wax did nicely remove all hair I am just not happy with the workability and texture of it.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Powers

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a waxing beginner so I still haven't gotten the hang of how exactly to use this, but I'm very pleased in the way the item arrived promptly, and as described. Also, I love all of the little lotions that came with
customer_reviews.author: Sarah fisher

customer_reviews.title: A great kit (except for the wax!)
customer_reviews.text: The creme wax was a total sticky mess and it was almost impossible to wash off! But the warmer works and the lotions that come with are amazing, especially the Slow Grow! I have very thick facial hair, it's been almost 2 weeks since I used the Slow Grow lotion and the few hairs that have come in are very small and thin, almost invisible! I'm in total awe and will definitely be buying more of the lotions! <3
customer_reviews.author: Tibi K.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this waxing kit
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this waxing kit. The wax is very thick & does not remove any hair. Just left with wax all over my chin & had to buy wax off product to get the wax off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GiGi Mini Pro Complete All-Purpose Hair Removal System Starter Mini Waxing Kit
product_meta.description: Do all your own waxing at home with a kit that has everything a beginner needs for a great wax, before, during, and after with the GiGi Mini Pro All Purpose Hair Removal Starter Waxing Kit. This complete hair removal system contains everything a new or price conscious stylist needs to do a top notch job, from pre and post wax treatments, lotions, waxes, accessories, tools, and a warmer. It also includes an instructional guide so you can hit the ground running and get started fast. Wax like an expert right at home by choosing the GiGi Mini Pro All Purpose Hair Removal Starter Waxing Kit.
feature_bullets: No need to go to the salon again, now you can do all your waxing right at home
Complete hair removal system for novices
Contains everything a beginner stylist needs
Features an array of pre and post treatments, lotions, waxes, and a warmer
Includes instructional booklet to get you started
